title: [Self-Directed] Information-Based Risk Management and Sustainability Leadership Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic risk management concepts and organizational operations experience
context.additional_context: Training for managers/leaders aged 40+ integrating risk management and sustainability strategies into an information-based framework, with asynchronous learning environments using digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically identify and prioritize risk factors using an information-based risk classification system.
Learners can design and apply risk management strategies for sustainable social development at the organizational level.
Based on a risk governance framework, strategies to enhance resilience can be proposed
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
